translations.help1: Select environment from the dropdown menu.
translations.help2: Set the parameter values that control the rotation of the flywheel using the respective slider controls.
translations.help3: To begin the experiment, click on the START EXPERIMENT button. You can also use the RELEASE FLYWHEEL button. The stopwatch buttons control only the stopwatch - they do not affect the experiment itself.
translations.help4: For manual timing: Start the stopwatch when the thread detaches from the flywheel and stop it when the wheel stops rotating. For automatic timing, enable AUTO CLOCK CONTROL - the stopwatch will start automatically when the thread detaches and stop when the wheel stops.
translations.help5: To view the results, click on the RESULT tab. Use the QUICK RESET button to restart the experiment while preserving your current parameter settings.
